abstract: Penthouse co-op designed with downtown vibe in stately limestone-and-brick building on Upper East Side is listed as $26.9 million.

headline.main: A Park Avenue Penthouse for $26.9 Million

snippet: A full-floor penthouse on Park Avenue, with a downtown, contemporary vibe, is about to enter the market.
lead_paragraph: A full-floor penthouse on Park Avenue, with a downtown, contemporary vibe, is about to enter the market.
